title: Shipyard Inc —— 造船厂
author: Jeansou
txt_content:
本帖最后由 dmin12 于 2019-7-27 14:00 编辑 
Shipyard Inc此地图为realm地图（分类：示例）
简介The primary creators of our map consist of: Celisio, zun, and b3nj1. Our map is inspiration of what a real world shipyard might look like in Minecraft and consists of many different trucks, containers and a variety of ships that can inspire players to build ships or industrial builds based off of real world concepts.
地图的创建者:Celisio, zun, 和 b3nj1.地图灵感来自真实世界造船厂在Minecraft中的样子,包括许多不同的卡车，集装箱和各种船只，可以激励玩家根据现实世界的概念建造船只或工业建筑。
为什么这个地图与众不同We feel our map is unique because of our attention to detail in real world concepts with the aim to inspire others to do the same.
我们注重现实世界的概念，旨在激励其他人也这样做。
截图












下载地址http://www.mediafire.com/file/y4h2zuv66gcac2r/ShipYardInc.zip/filehttps://pan.baidu.com/s/1O6xatSW77GEqyrGVkRKnVg
